data.title: Barbara Stanwyck
data.text:
AKA Ruby Katherine Stevens

Born: 16-Jul-1907

Birthplace: Brooklyn, NY

Died: 20-Jan-1990

Location of death: Santa Monica, CA

Cause of death: Heart Failure

Remains: Cremated (ashes scattered in Lone Pine, CA)

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Matter of Dispute

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Double Indemnity

Mother: (d. trolly accident when Barbara was four)

Brother: Bert Stevens

Husband: Frank Fay (Broadway comic, m. 26-Aug-1928, div. Feb-1936, one child)

Son: Dion Fay (adopted)

Husband: (ambiguous link, Robert Taylor) (actor, m. 13-May-1939, div. 1951)

Motion Picture Alliance for the Preservation of American Ideals

Endorsement of American Tobacco Company Lucky Strike cigarettes

Endorsement of Liggett Group Chesterfield cigarettes

Endorsement of Ronson Lighters 1947

National Cowboy Hall of Fame 1973

American Film Institute Life Achievement Award 1987

Risk Factors: Smoking

TELEVISION

The Colbys Constance Colby (1985-86)

The Big Valley Victoria Barkley (1965-69)
